keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: A small delegation representing the Kurdistan Regional Government uses tactics like those of corporations that spend millions to grease the levers of power.

headline.print_headline: Iraqi Kurds Build a Lobbying Machine in Washington to Fight ISIS at Home
headline.main: Iraqi Kurds Build Washington Lobbying Machine to Fund War Against ISIS

snippet: A small delegation representing the Kurdistan Regional Government uses tactics like those of corporations that spend millions to grease the levers of power.
abstract: Kurdistan has dispatched small lobbying delegation to Washington to ask for funding for fight against Islamic State, which has become necessity in light of decline in oil prices that is stripping country of ability to pay for war effort; Kurds' success in getting support from lawmakers from across political spectrum is all more notable because it comes during time of austerity.
